subject: Baseball
Little League World Series
lead_paragraph: Adam Cramer struck out 13 in five innings, and Lewisberry, Pa., reached the final of the United States bracket by beating Pearland, Tex., 3-0.
snippet: Adam Cramer struck out 13 in five innings, and Lewisberry, Pa., reached the final of the United States bracket by beating Pearland, Tex., 3-0.
